Package de.hadizadeh.positioning.viewer.content

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ContentAudioFragment
    Fragment for displaying an audio player for contents which have an audio file
    ContentFragment
    Fragment for managing multiple content fragments of different types and joining them in a tab view
    ContentFragmentPagerAdapter
    Manages the tabs for content groups
    ContentTextFragment
    Fragment for displaying a long content description text
    ContentTitleFragment
    Fragment for displaying the title, a short description and an image of the content
    ContentUrlFragment
    Fragment for managing urls and showing them in a webview
    ContentVideoFragment
    Fragment for showing a video player
